code: import React,{useState}from'react';import API from'../../api';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=()=>{const[form,setForm]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:'',role:'user'});const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await API.post('/auth/register',form);alert('Registration successful');window.location.href='/login';}catch(error){alert(error.response.data.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name",value:form.name,onChange:e=>setForm({...form,name:e.target.value}),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:form.email,onChange:e=>setForm({...form,email:e.target.value}),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:form.password,onChange:e=>setForm({...form,password:e.target.value}),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:form.role,onChange:e=>setForm({...form,role:e.target.value}),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"user",children:"User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"hr",children:"HR"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Register"})]});};export default Register;
